articles.title: Audio Codec Made by Apple Introduced Serious Vulnerabilities in Millions of Android Phones - SecurityWeek
articles.description: The open source Apple Lossless Audio Codec (ALAC) is affected by serious vulnerabilities that have been pushed out to millions of Android devices by major mobile chipset manufacturers.
articles.content:
An open source audio codec developed by Apple is affected by serious vulnerabilities that have been pushed to millions of Android devices by some of the worlds largest mobile chipset manufacturers.

articles.title: Samsung Exynos 1280 SoC officially announced - India Today
articles.description: Samsung Exynos 1280 SoC is based on a 5nm EUV process. The chipset is already available in the Samsung Galaxy A53 5G, Galaxy M33 5G and the Galaxy A33 5G.
